name: Super Plane Rush
description:
Fly far and collect rings to buy upgrades, unlock different planes, and levels. Tap and hold to fly (throttle) and let off to fall... but don't crash in to trees, cactus, balloons and more. How far can you fly?

• 12 sweet planes
• 5 awesome levels
• 5 experienced pilots

What Upgrades can you get with Rings?:
• Ring Magnet - Draws rings to your plane.
• Ring Value - Increase ring value
• Boost - Become invincible and speed up

Have a Heart:
If you want to fly even farther, you can enable hearts though In-app purchase. When you have a heart, instead of your flight being over when you crash into a tree, balloon, or whatever, you’ll simply lose your heart.
